mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.laoshi_id as laoshiId ,a.kecheng_uuid_number as kechengUuidNumber ,a.kecheng_name as kechengName ,a.kecheng_address as kechengAddress ,a.kecheng_file as kechengFile ,a.kecheng_types as kechengTypes ,a.kaishi_time as kaishiTime ,a.jieshu_time as jieshuTime ,a.jiezhi_time as jiezhiTime ,a.kecheng_content as kechengContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,laoshi.laoshi_name as laoshiName ,laoshi.laoshi_phone as laoshiPhone ,laoshi.laoshi_id_number as laoshiIdNumber ,laoshi.laoshi_photo as laoshiPhoto ,laoshi.laoshi_email as laoshiEmail
FROM kecheng a left JOIN laoshi laoshi ON a.laoshi_id = laoshi.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.laoshi_id = #{params.laoshiId} )
and a.kecheng_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.kechengUuidNumber},'%')
and a.kecheng_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.kechengName},'%')
and a.kecheng_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.kechengAddress},'%')
and a.kecheng_types = #{params.kechengTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.kaishi_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.kaishiTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.kaishi_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.kaishiTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.jieshu_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.jieshuTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.jieshu_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.jieshuTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.jiezhi_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.jiezhiTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.jiezhi_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.jiezhiTimeEnd})
and a.kecheng_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.kechengContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.laoshi_id IS NOT NULL
and laoshi.laoshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiName},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiPhone},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiIdNumber},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
